Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio hit a game-tying home run in the eighth inning
Garrett Mitchell hit a two-run home run in the eighth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets could smell the champagne, they were so close
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets didn't score the rest of the way, though they had their opportunities
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets had 15 hits, only two for extra bases, and nine walks
They’ve even stolen more bases than the Brewers; Starling Marte’s in the fourth is the only one for either team all series
Others: The Mets jumped on Brewers starter Frankie Montas in the top of the first inning
Mets starter Sean Manaea was able to contain the Brewers after allowing six earned runs in 3 2/3 innings against the Brewers last Friday
